info.title: ManagedResolverManagementClient
info.description: The Managed DNS Resolver Management Client.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

202.description: The operation to upsert resolver has been accepted and will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Default response. It will be deserialized as per the Error definition.

ResolverProperties.description: Represents the properties of a resolver.

virtualNetwork.description: The reference to the virtual network. This cannot be changed after creation.

maxNumberOfInboundEndpoints.description: The maximum number of inbound endpoints that can be created for the resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfInboundEndpoints.description: The current number of inbound endpoints for the resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

maxNumberOfOutboundEndpoints.description: The maximum number of outbound endpoints that can be created for the resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfOutboundEndpoints.description: The current number of outbound endpoints for the resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

managedResolverState.description: The current status of the resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the resolver. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

ResolverListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on resolvers.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

InboundEndpointProperties.description: Represents the properties of an inbound endpoint for a resolver.

subnet.description: The reference to the subnet used for IP configurations.

ipConfigurations.description: IP configurations for the inbound endpoint.

scaleUnit.description: The scale unit for the inbound endpoint.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the inbound endpoint. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

InboundEndpoint.description: Describes an inbound endpoint for a resolver.

InboundEndpointListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on inbound endpoints for a resolver.

value.description: Enumeration of the inbound endpoints for a resolver.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

OutboundEndpointProperties.description: Represents the properties of an outbound endpoint for a resolver.

scaleUnit.description: The scale unit for the outbound endpoint.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the outbound endpoint. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

OutboundEndpoint.description: Describes an outbound endpoint for a resolver.

OutboundEndpointListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on outbound endpoints for a resolver.

value.description: Enumeration of the outbound endpoints for a resolver.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

RulesetLinkProperties.description: Represents the properties of a ruleset link to a resolver.

managedResolverRuleset.description: The reference to the ruleset. This cannot be changed after creation.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the link. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

RulesetLink.description: Describes a ruleset link to resolver.

etag.description: ETag of the ruleset link to resolver.

properties.description: Properties of a ruleset link to resolver.

RulesetLinkListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on ruleset links to resolver.

value.description: Enumeration of the ruleset links to resolver.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

RulesetProperties.description: Represents the properties of a ruleset.

maxNumberOfRules.description: The maximum number of rules that can be created in this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfRules.description: The current number of rules in this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

maxNumberOfResolverLinks.description: The maximum number of resolvers that can be linked to this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfResolverLinks.description: The current number of resolvers that are linked to this ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the ruleset. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

RulesetListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on rulesets.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

RuleProperties.description: Represents the properties of a rule within the ruleset.

action.description: The action to take as part of rule execution. Use 'Forward' to route the DNS queries for the domain to servers specified as part of `targetDnsServers` property. Use 'Default' to render default behavior (skipping rule execution) for the specified domain. This value cannot be changed after the rule has been created.

targetDnsServers.description: Enumeration of DNS servers to forward the DNS query to. This property is only applicable when the rule `type` is set to 'Forward'.

disabled.description: Is the rule disabled? Allows users to disable a specific rule without deleting it.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the rule. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

Rule.description: Describes a rule within a ruleset.

properties.description: Properties of a rule within the ruleset.

RuleListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on rules within a ruleset.

value.description: Enumeration of the rules within a ruleset.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

ResolverLinkProperties.description: Represents the properties of a resolver link to a ruleset.

managedResolver.description: The reference to the link for the current ruleset under the resolver.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the link. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

ResolverLink.description: Describes a resolver link to ruleset.

etag.description: ETag of the resolver link to ruleset.

properties.description: Properties of a resolver link to ruleset.

ResolverLinkListResult.description: The response to an enumeration operation on resolver links to ruleset.

value.description: Enumeration of the resolver links to ruleset.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

privateIpAddress.description: Private IP address for the IP configuration.

ProvisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the resource.

TargetDnsServer.description: Describes a server to forward the DNS queries to.

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Example - '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/managedResolvers/{resolverName}'.

type.description: The type of the resource. Example - 'Microsoft.Network/managedResolvers'.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for an ARM proxy resource.

CloudErrorBody.description: The body of an error message

message.description: A description of what caused the error

target.description: The target resource of the error message

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

InboundEndpointNameParameter.name: inboundEndpointName
InboundEndpointNameParameter.description: The name of the inbound endpoint for the resolver.

OutboundEndpointNameParameter.name: outboundEndpointName
OutboundEndpointNameParameter.description: The name of the outbound endpoint for the resolver.

RulesetLinkNameParameter.name: rulesetLinkName
RulesetLinkNameParameter.description: The name of the ruleset link to resolver.

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: The maximum number of results to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 results.

IfMatchParameter.name: If-Match
IfMatchParameter.description: ETag of the resource. Omit this value to always overwrite the current resource. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting any concurrent changes.

IfNoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
IfNoneMatchParameter.description: Set to '*' to allow a new resource to be created, but to prevent updating an existing resource. Other values will be ignored.
